items.content_html: A visual modding engine for Mindustry built with Electron. Offers live reload, smart asset management, and a lightweight interface for real-time creation. Designed for both beginners and advanced users to streamline, expand, and simplify the mod development process.

items.content_html: Simple To-Do List App (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) A lightweight, responsive to-do list application built with HTML, CSS, and vanilla JavaScript. This app allows users to add, complete, and delete tasksâ€”all without any backend or storage. Ideal for beginners learning DOM manipulation and event handling.

This app allows users to add, complete, and delete tasksâ€”all without any backend or storage. Ideal for beginners learning DOM manipulation and event handling.
